timeline.message:
Fix tests expecting ES3

Default version is now ES 6 and unnamed

Fix tests expecting ES3

Default version is now ES 6 and unnamed

timeline.bodyText:
I'll internalize this class (and others) on master before merging this PR to pmd/7.0.x.
E.g. in pmd-java, we already deprecated JavaLanguageHandler and JavaLanguageParser telling the users to use LanguageVersionHandler#getParser(ParserOptions) instead....
although in future, ParserOptions will be gone... but that's another step
timeline.author: adangel

timeline.bodyText:
We can also remove this useless class comment.
I guess, when PMD first supported Javascript, it was ECMAScript Version 3....
timeline.author: adangel

timeline.bodyText: Why not Objects.requireNonNull? Ok, it has a little bit additional support for building the NPE message.....
timeline.author: adangel

timeline.bodyText: I'll change the version to "ES6" instead of a empty string.
timeline.author: adangel
